text: "Vehicles transporting & freezers storing the #COVID19 #vaccine need to be monitored in real time ... #data increasingly comes from #IoT sensors [and] #machinelearning algorithms can be used [for] #analytics" by @howellsrichard @gross_alinaa via @forbes https://t.co/nDpGKfSgYZ https://t.co/RVi9OKpcms
